english.segment1: Nobody gonna take my car, I'm gonna race it to the ground. Nobody gonna beat my car, it's gonna break the speed of sound. Oh, it's a killing machine, it's got everything. Like a driving power big fat tires everything
english.segment2: I love it and I need it I bleed it. Yeah it's a wild hurricane. Alright, hold tight, I'm a highway star
english.segment3: Nobody gonna take my girl I'm gonna keep her to the end. Nobody gonna have my girl she stays close on every bend. Oh, she's a killing machine, she's got everything. Like a moving mouth, body control and everything
english.segment4: I love her, I need her, I seed her. Yeah, she turns me on. Alright, hold tight, I'm a highway star
english.segment5: Nobody gonna take my head I got speed inside my brain. Nobody gonna steal my head now that I'm on the road again. Oh, I'm in heaven again, I've got everything. Like a moving ground, throttle control and everything
english.segment6: I love it, I need it, I seed it. Eight cylinders all mine. Alright, hold tight, I'm a highway star
english.segment7: Nobody gonna take my car, I'm gonna race it to the ground. Nobody gonna beat my car, it's gonna break the speed of sound. Oh, it's a killing machine, it's got everything. Like a driving power big fat tires everything
english.segment8: I love it and I need it I bleed it. Yeah, it's a wild hurricane. Alright, hold tight, I'm a highway star
